property.name: sun.java.command
property.value: org.codehaus.plexus.classworlds.launcher.Launcher -Denvironment.configuration=src/test/resources/website/test.environment.system.properties -Dexternal.configuration=../current.test.properties -DtestRunRootDirectory=C:\WIP\ValtechQAAutomationChallenge\Output\FullTestSuite -DhighlightElementsAsWeUseThem=true -DshowProgressNotifications=true -DtakeScreenshots=true -DrecordAVideo=true clean test -Dcucumber.options=-p progress --add-plugin html:C:/WIP/ValtechQAAutomationChallenge/Output/FullTestSuite --snippets camelcase -g step_definitions features
